The photo in question was published on F: 2020, and has been shared more than 400 times.
The Urdu: language caption of the post claims that the photo shows former Pakistani Prime Minister Nawaz Sharif meeting with the Israeli ambassador and making a deal involving Pakistan's nuclear secrets. This claim is said to be mentioned in the 10th volume of the JIT report as evidence.
Similar claims with the same image were: 4. A reverse image search on Google revealed that the photo was doctored from an original image showing Sharif meeting the former German Foreign Minister Guido Westerwelle in Islamabad in June 2013. The original photo's caption provides details about the actual meeting.
